jparsec.time.calendar

Class MayanLongCount

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.time.calendar.MayanLongCount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MayanLongCount
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implements the Mayan Long Count calendar.

    A strictly counting days calendar, based on a cycle of 2 880 000 days. See Calendrical Calculations for reference.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
